Package QUORIDOR

package QUORIDOR
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    Field
    The class that subsequently forms the playing field
    GameField
    This is where most of the game is processed Includes the playing field and working with the players
    GamePanel
    Class that transfers graphical representation Most of the logic for the quoridor game is handled here
    HiddenMoveButton
    A class that mediates the movement of players around the playing field
    MoveButton
    Class that displays hidden buttons for movement
    PlaceWallButton
    Class containing a button for displaying walls on the playing field
    Player
    Represents the player behind the computer in the game
    Quoridor
    There's a whole game of quoridor going on here
    ResetQuoridorButton
    Class that creates the ability to reset the Tic Tac Toe game
    SidePanel
    Creates a side panel on which the moin control buttons are located
    Wall
    Creates obstacles between Fields and graphical output for the players
  • Enum Class Summary
    Enum Class
    Description
    WallDirection
    Divides walls into horizontal and vertical
